workMelodics.title: Our Approach to Scalable and Cost-Effective Solutions
workMelodics.workingMethod: We focus on delivering solutions that are easy to use, affordable to run, and simple to adapt as your needs change. We avoid unnecessarily complex systems that require frequent maintenance. Instead, we prioritize solutions that give you control, flexibility, and lower long-term costs.

domeneshop.title: Domeneshop
domeneshop.description: For domain purchases and management, we recommend Domeneshop. They offer stable and affordable services that fit most needs.

strapi.title: Strapi
strapi.description: We use Strapi for content management. It’s a user-friendly system that makes it easy to edit and publish content without technical expertise.

render.title: Render
render.description: We use Render for backend operations. It offers a free plan that’s ideal for smaller projects and makes upgrading easy when needed.

vercel.title: Vercel
vercel.description: For frontend and website hosting, we typically use Vercel. It’s a reliable platform that offers free hosting for simple static sites – with no hidden costs.

workMelodics.techApproach: We always tailor the technical setup to your needs, with a focus on usability, security, and future growth. We avoid platforms that require constant updates and maintenance – such as WordPress – unless there's a clear need for it. Many projects benefit more from a simpler, modern approach.
workMelodics.streamlinedSolution: By combining a static website with a flexible content system, you get a solution that is secure, fast, and easy to maintain and expand.
